summary.span: 表示要對資料來源執行的 SQL 陳述式或預存程序。

span.span: Represents an SQL statement or stored procedure to execute against a data source.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供下列方法來針對資料來源執行命令：The class provides the following methods for executing commands against a data source: |項目Item|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| ||執行傳回資料列的命令。Executes commands that return rows.| ||執行命令，例如 SQL 插入、 刪除、 更新和 SET 陳述式。Executes commands such as SQL INSERT, DELETE, UPDATE, and SET statements.| ||從資料庫擷取單一值，例如，彙總值。Retrieves a single value, for example, an aggregate value, from a database.| 您可以重設屬性和重複使用物件。You can reset the property and reuse the object. 不過，您必須關閉然後您才能執行新的或上一個命令。However, you must close the before you can execute a new or previous command. 如果命令執行造成嚴重SQL Server 嚴重性層級 20 或更久，例如可能會關閉。If execution of the command causes a fatal such as a SQL Server severity level of 20 or more, may close. 但是，使用者可以再次開啟連線，然後繼續進行。However, the user can reopen the connection and continue. ## Examples 下列範例會使用。The following example uses . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcCommand/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcCommand/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Cancel() cil managed

summary.span: 嘗試取消 的執行。

span.span: Tries to cancel the execution of an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有要取消的作業，則不會發生任何狀況。If there is nothing to cancel, nothing occurs. 不過，如果命令中有程序，並且取消嘗試失敗，就會不產生任何例外狀況。However, if there is a command in process, and the cancellation try fails, no exception is generated. 若要取消上一個執行緒，查詢必須從另一個執行緒呼叫。To cancel a query on one thread, must be called from another thread. 因為您無法執行命令，以非同步方式與、 取消從另一個執行緒，命令必須以同步方式執行一個執行緒。Because you cannot execute commands asynchronously with , to cancel a command from another thread, one thread must be running synchronously. 這表示物件必須可從這兩個執行緒存取。This means that the object must be accessible from both threads.

summary.span: 取得或設定 SQL 陳述式或預存程序以對資料來源執行。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL statement or stored procedure to execute against the data source.

value.span: 要執行的 SQL 陳述式或預存程序。

span.span: The SQL statement or stored procedure to execute.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`StoredProcedure`，則屬性應該使用標準 ODBC 預存程序逸出序列來設定。When the property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the property should be set using standard ODBC stored procedure escape sequences. 設定預存程序的名稱無法運作的其他.NET Framework 資料提供者所顯示的一樣。Setting the to the name of the stored procedure does not function as it does for other .NET Framework data providers. 許多語言功能，例如外部聯結和純量函式呼叫，通常是由資料來源實作。Many language features, such as outer joins and scalar function calls, are generally implemented by data sources. 即使這些功能的語法通常是資料來源特有的。Even the syntax for these features is generally data source-specific. 因此，ODBC 會定義包含下列語言功能的標準語法的逸出序列：Therefore, ODBC defines escape sequences that contain standard syntax for the following language features: - 日期、 時間、 時間戳記和日期時間間隔常值Date, time, timestamp, and datetime interval literals - 純量函式，例如包含數字、 字串和資料類型轉換函式Scalar functions such as numeric, string, and data type conversion functions - 讓述詞逸出字元LIKE predicate escape character - 外部聯結Outer joins - 程序呼叫Procedure calls ODBC 使用的逸出序列如下所示：The escape sequence used by ODBC is as follows: ``` {extension} ``` 此逸出序列會辨識並剖析由 ODBC 驅動程式。This escape sequence is recognized and parsed by ODBC drivers. 它們取代為任何逸出序列的資料來源特有的文法。They then replace any escape sequences with data source-specific grammar. 程序是儲存在資料來源的可執行物件。A procedure is an executable object stored at the data source. 一般而言，它是已經先行編譯的一或多個 SQL 陳述式。Generally, it is one or more SQL statements that have been precompiled. 是逸出序列呼叫程序The escape sequence for calling a procedure is ``` {[?=]call procedure-name[([parameter][,[parameter]]...)]} ``` 何處`procedure-name`指定程序的名稱和`parameter`指定程序參數。where `procedure-name` specifies the name of a procedure and `parameter` specifies a procedure parameter. 當您呼叫其中一個 Execute 方法時，命令會執行這個預存程序 (例如或)。The command executes this stored procedure when you call one of the Execute methods (for example, or ). 您無法設定，和如果目前的連接正在執行 execute 或提取作業的屬性。You cannot set the , and properties if the current connection is performing an execute or fetch operation. ODBC.NET 提供者不支援具名的參數來傳遞參數至 SQL 陳述式或被呼叫的預存程序時設定為`Text`。The ODBC.NET Provider does not support named parameters for passing parameters to an SQL statement or a stored procedure called by an when is set to `Text`. 在此情況下，您必須使用問號 （？） 預留位置。In this case, the question mark (?) placeholder must be used. 例如: For example: ``` SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = ? ``` 因此，順序物件加入至必須直接對應至問號預留位置參數的位置。Therefore, the order in which objects are added to the must directly correspond to the position of the question mark placeholder for the parameter. 如果參數包含 null 值，.NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC 仍會繫結該參數，但會使用預設參數，如果其中一個已定義使用 SQL_DEFAULT_PARAM，而不是 null 的值。If a parameter contains a null value, the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC still binds that parameter, but uses a default parameter, if one has been defined by using SQL_DEFAULT_PARAM, instead of the null value. 比方說， :For example, the : ``` {1, null, 2} ``` 傳遞至屬性：passed into the property: ``` {call sp(?, ?, ?)} ``` 會導致繫結的第一個參數為值 1、 第三個參數的值為 2 和為 SQL_DEFAULT_PARAM 的第二個參數的 odbc 的.NET Framework Data Provider。causes the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC binding the first parameter to the value 1, the third parameter to the value 2, and the second parameter as SQL_DEFAULT_PARAM. 不過，此行為與驅動程式相關。However, this behavior is driver-dependent. 如果驅動程式不支援這項功能，就不要傳入值參數。If the driver does not support this functionality, just do not pass in a value for the parameter. 例如，使用:For example, use the : ``` {1, 2} ``` 設定和屬性如下：and set the property to the following: ``` {call sp(?, null, ?)} ``` > [!NOTE] > 如果省略參數，則仍然必須出現的逗號分隔的其他參數。If a parameter is omitted, the comma delimiting it from other parameters must still appear. 如果省略了輸入或輸入/輸出參數，則此程序會使用參數的預設值。If an input or input/output parameter is omitted, the procedure uses the default value of the parameter. 若要指定之長度/指標緩衝區的值設定為輸入或輸入/輸出參數的預設值的另一種方式繫結至 SQL_DEFAULT_PARAM 的參數。Another way to specify the default value of an input or input/output parameter is to set the value of the length/indicator buffer bound to the parameter to SQL_DEFAULT_PARAM.

summary.span: 取得或設定結束執行命令的嘗試並產生錯誤之前的等待時間。

span.span: Gets or sets the wait time before terminating an attempt to execute a command and generating an error.

value.span: 等待命令執行的時間 (以秒為單位)。

span.span: The time in seconds to wait for the command to execute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值為零 (0) 指定的等候時間，而不是沒有等待時間，沒有限制，因此應該予以避免。A value of zero (0) specifies no limit to the wait time, instead of no wait time, and therefore should be avoided.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示如何解譯 屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates how the property is interpreted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`StoredProcedure`，您應該設定完整的 ODBC call 語法的屬性。When the property is set to `StoredProcedure`, you should set the property to the full ODBC call syntax. 命令再執行這個預存程序，當您呼叫其中一個 Execute 方法 (例如或)。The command then executes this stored procedure when you call one of the Execute methods (for example, or ). ，和屬性 nelze nastavit，pokud 目前連接正在執行 execute 或擷取作業。The , and properties cannot be set if the current connection is performing an execute or fetch operation. ODBC 的.NET Framework 資料提供者不支援傳遞已命名的 SQL 陳述式或被呼叫的預存程序的參數。The .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC does not support passing named parameters to an SQL statement or to a stored procedure called by an . 在任一情況中，會使用問號 （？） 預留位置。In either of these cases, use the question mark (?) placeholder. 例如: For example: ``` SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = ? ``` 順序物件加入至必須直接對應至問號預留位置參數的位置。The order in which objects are added to the must directly correspond to the position of the question mark placeholder for the parameter. > [!NOTE] > 不支援.NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC設定`TableDirect`。The .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC does not support the setting of `TableDirect`.

span.span: The value was not a valid .

span.span: Gets or sets the used by this instance of the .
The connection to a data source.
The default is a null value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您無法設定， ，和如果目前的連接正在執行 execute 或提取作業的屬性。You cannot set the , , and properties if the current connection is performing an execute or fetch operation. 如果在異動進行時設定 ，且 屬性不是 null，則會產生 。If you set while a transaction is in progress and the property is not null, an is generated. 如果您設定交易已經認可或回復之後，屬性不是 null，屬性則設為 null 值。If you set after the transaction has been committed or rolled back, and the property is not null, the property is then set to a null value.

exception.span: 當交易正在進行中時， 屬性會變更。

span.span: The property was changed while a transaction was in progress.

summary.span: 針對 執行 SQL 陳述式，並傳回受影響的資料列數。

span.span: Executes an SQL statement against the and returns the number of rows affected.

returns.span: 對 UPDATE、INSERT 和 DELETE 陳述式而言，傳回值是受命令影響的資料列數目。

span.span: For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command.

returns.span: 對其他類型的陳述式而言，傳回值為 -1。

span.span: For all other types of statements, the return value is -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用來執行資料庫目錄作業 （例如，查詢資料庫的結構或建立資料庫物件，例如資料表）; 或在資料庫中，將資料變更而不需使用、 藉由執行更新、 插入或刪除陳述式。You can use to perform catalog operations (for example, querying the structure of a database or creating database objects such as tables); or to change the data in a database, without using a , by executing UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE statements. 您也可以使用執行多個 SQL 陳述式，如果基礎 ODBC 驅動程式支援這項功能。You can also use to execute multiple SQL statements if the underlying ODBC driver supports this functionality. 在此情況下，傳回的值是在命令中的所有陳述式所影響的資料列數目。In this case, the return value is the number of rows affected by all statements in the command. 雖然傳回任何資料列時，任何輸出參數或傳回對應至參數的值會填入資料。Although returns no rows, any output parameters or return values mapped to parameters are populated with data. 對 UPDATE、INSERT 和 DELETE 陳述式而言，傳回值是受命令影響的資料列數目。For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command. 對其他類型的陳述式而言，傳回值為 -1。For all other types of statements, the return value is -1. 發生復原時，傳回的值也是-1。If a rollback occurs, the return value is also -1. 當有觸發程序資料表和資料新增或變更資料表中，則傳回值包括受 insert 或 update 作業和觸發程序或觸發程序所影響的資料列數目的資料列數目。When a trigger exists on a table and data is being added or changed in the table, the return value includes the number of rows affected by both the insert or update operation and the number of rows affected by the trigger or triggers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您應該設定完整的 ODBC call 語法的預存程序的屬性。You should set the property to the full ODBC call syntax for stored procedures. 命令執行這個預存程序，當您呼叫。The command executes this stored procedure when you call . 雖然使用時，相關聯忙於處理。While the is used, the associated is busy serving the . 處於此狀態時，沒有其他作業可對以外關閉它。While in this state, no other operations can be performed on the other than closing it. 此情況下，直到方法的呼叫。This is the case until the method of the is called.

summary.span: 傳送 至 ，並使用其中一個 值來建立 。

span.span: Sends the to the , and builds an using one of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您預期您的 SQL 陳述式，傳回單一資料列，則指定`SingleRow`做為值可能會改善應用程式的效能。If you expect your SQL statement to return only a single row, specifying `SingleRow` as the value may improve application performance. 您應該設定完整的 ODBC call 語法的預存程序的屬性。You should set the property to the full ODBC call syntax for stored procedures. 命令執行這個預存程序，當您呼叫。The command executes this stored procedure when you call . 支援特殊的模式，可讓大型二進位值，有效率地讀取。The supports a special mode that enables large binary values to be read efficiently. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < `SequentialAccess` 設定。For more information, see the `SequentialAccess` setting for . > [!NOTE] > `SequentialAccess`的值為 不限制設定; 它只是表示您必須至少循序方式存取。The `SequentialAccess` value of is not a limiting setting; it just means that you will have at least sequential access to the . 例如，當您使用 SQL Server ODBC 驅動程式，在`SequentialAccess`模式中，您仍然可以移動至第一個資料行的之後循序一路閱讀到所有其他的資料行的資料列。For example, when you use the SQL Server ODBC Driver in `SequentialAccess` mode, you can still move to the first column of an row after having read through all the other columns sequentially. 雖然使用時，相關聯忙於處理。While the is used, the associated is busy serving the . 處於此狀態時，沒有其他作業可對以外關閉它。While in this state, no other operations can be performed on the other than closing it. 這會是大小寫，直到您呼叫方法。This is the case until you call the method. 如果會透過設為`CloseConnection`，正在關閉自動關閉連線。If the is created with set to `CloseConnection`, closing the closes the connection automatically.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object ExecuteScalar() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ExecuteScalar () As Object

summary.span: 執行查詢，並傳回查詢所傳回的結果集第一個資料列的第一個資料行。

span.span: Executes the query, and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query.

summary.span: 會忽略其他的資料行或資料列。

span.span: Additional columns or rows are ignored.

returns.span: 結果集中第一個資料列的第一個資料行，或是 null 參考 (如果結果集是空的)。

span.span: The first column of the first row in the result set, or a null reference if the result set is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以從資料來源中擷取單一值 （例如，彙總的值）。Use the method to retrieve a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a data source. 這需要較少的程式碼比使用方法，然後再執行 若要從傳回的資料產生單一值所需的作業。This requires less code than using the method, and then performing the operations required to generate the single value from the data returned by an .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Parameters As OdbcParameterCollection

summary.span: 取得 。

value.span: SQL 陳述式或預存程序的參數。

span.span: The parameters of the SQL statement or stored procedure.
The default is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設定為`Text`，ODBC 的.NET Framework 資料提供者不支援傳遞已命名的 SQL 陳述式或被呼叫的預存程序的參數。When is set to `Text`, the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC does not support passing named parameters to an SQL statement or to a stored procedure called by an . 在任一情況中，會使用問號 （？） 預留位置。In either of these cases, use the question mark (?) placeholder. 例如: For example: ``` SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = ? ``` 順序物件加入至必須直接對應至問號預留位置參數的命令文字中的位置。The order in which objects are added to the must directly correspond to the position of the question mark placeholder for the parameter in the command text. > [!NOTE] > 如果在集合中的參數不相符的查詢執行的需求，可能會產生錯誤。If the parameters in the collection do not match the requirements of the query to be executed, an error may result.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Prepare() cil managed

summary.span: 在資料來源上建立命令已備妥或已編譯的版本。

span.span: Creates a prepared or compiled version of the command at the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呼叫 ODBC`SQLPrepare`函式。The method calls the ODBC `SQLPrepare` function. 根據基礎 ODBC 驅動程式和資料來源的功能，例如資料類型的參數資訊可能檢查時準備陳述式，如果所有參數都已繫都結，或執行時，如果沒有所有參數都已繫都都結。Depending on the capabilities of the underlying ODBC driver and data source, parameter information such as data types may be checked when the statement is prepared, if all parameters have been bound, or when it is executed if not all parameters have been bound. 最大的互通性，應用程式應該解除所有套用至先前的 SQL 陳述式之前準備新的 SQL 陳述式，在相同的參數繫結。For maximum interoperability, an application should unbind all parameters that applied to a previous SQL statement before preparing a new SQL statement on the same . 這可防止先前套用至新的 SQL 陳述式的參數資訊所造成的錯誤。This prevents errors that are caused by previous parameter information being applied to the new SQL statement. 如果您呼叫 Execute 方法之後呼叫，任何大於所指定之值的參數值屬性便會自動截斷成原始的指定大小的參數，也不截斷會傳回錯誤.If you call an Execute method after you call , any parameter value that is larger than the value specified by the property is automatically truncated to the original specified size of the parameter, and no truncation errors are returned. 輸出參數 （不論是否已備妥） 必須有使用者指定的資料類型。Output parameters (whether prepared or not) must have a user-specified data type. 如果您指定的可變長度資料類型時，您也必須指定最大值。If you specify a variable length data type, you must also specify the maximum .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResetCommandTimeout() cil managed

summary.span: 重設 屬性為預設值。

span.span: Resets the property to the default value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值為 30 秒。The default value of the is 30 seconds.

summary.span: 取得或設定在其中執行 的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the within which the executes.
The default is a null value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您不能設定如果它已經設為特定的值，因此命令執行程序中的屬性。You cannot set the property if it is already set to a specific value, and the command is in the process of executing. 如果您設定交易屬性未連線到相同的物件做為物件時，會擲回例外狀況，下次您嘗試執行陳述式。If you set the transaction property to an object that is not connected to the same as the object, an exception will be thrown the next time that you try to execute a statement.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定 **Update** 方法應該如何將命令結果套用至 **DataRow**。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies how the **Update** method should apply command results to the **DataRow**.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值值是**兩者**除非自動產生命令，如同，預設值是在此情況下**None**。The default value is **Both** unless the command is automatically generated, as with the , in which case the default is **None**. 如需有關如何使用屬性，請參閱 < [DataAdapter 的參數](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md)。For more information about how to use the property, see [DataAdapter Parameters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md).
